DOC.brief_title: Phase I/II Randomized Study Hydroxyurea With Without Clotrimazole Patients With Sickle Cell Anemia
DOC.detailed_description: PROTOCOL OUTLINE : This randomize study . Patients randomize one two treatment arm . Arm I : Patients receive oral hydroxyurea oral clotrimazole daily 12 month . Arm II : Patients receive oral hydroxyurea daily 12 month . Patients follow 6 week . Completion date provide represent completion date grant per OOPD record
